acupoints.name: Kidney Shu
acupoints.location_hint: 1.5 cun lateral to L2 spinous process
acupoints.notes: Tonifies Kidneys; chronic low back soreness.

acupoints.name: Weizhong
acupoints.notes: Key distal point for back pain/sciatica.

acupoints.name: Huantiao
acupoints.location_hint: Posterolateral hip, junction of outer third and inner two-thirds between greater trochanter and sacrum

acupoints.name: Kunlun
acupoints.notes: Relaxes channel; used for back and neck pain.

acupoints.name: Taixi
acupoints.location_hint: Between medial malleolus and Achilles tendon
acupoints.notes: Supports Kidney yin/yang; chronic low back pain.
